comments:
I have just installed birt. I switch to the report perspective. Create a new
report project. I attempt to create a new report. I can choose the type, and the
file name, once I click finish I get an SWT error and find the following in the
.log.  At that point I am unable to load eclipse. I have to remove the birt
plugins before I can get back in.

Looks this bug more like a inviroment problem. Could you please provide more 
information like eclipse sdb version, SWT,GEF version, that you installed?

This was a problem that installing an earlier version of Mozilla and setting the
MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME environment variable took care of.
Verified in build 20051219. Can't reproduce here.
